That should be enough reason to ensure that it never receives another taxpayer dollar from our government. ( Abortions are about 3 percent of Planned Parenthood's overall work.) On Nov. 21, 2001, the president led Donald Rumsfeld to a small office near the Situation Room and asked: Where do we stand on the Iraq planning? Donald Rumsfeld quickly prodded military leaders on the subject. of course. Simon Cowell , Nigel Lythgoe had a lot to say about him as well as he talks about how the show was getting to dark with Simon Cowell 's constant nasty remarks to contestants. He goes on to say I think Steven Tyler and Jennifer Lopez are both stars in their own right. You forget that we've had this train wreck that was following Simon Cowell , and then Simon Cowell disassociated himself from the show over the last few years, turned his back on the strange people they brought in to judge. So I knew it was going to be better than people expected. He adds that the show has never been about Simon Cowell and he was the one person not worried when people told him to give up on Idol after Simon Cowell 's departure.
